origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'SocialMediaAnalytics.get_platform_analysis', 'description': 'Get an analysis of the major social media platforms in the context of influencer economy', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of analysis needed'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'platform_analysis', 'description': 'the analysis of the major social media platforms'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名市场分析师，正在评估网红经济的社交媒体策略。首先，我需要获取网红经济中的主要社交媒体平台分析。然后，我需要获取这些平台的用户增长和活跃度数据。接下来，我需要获取网红经济中的社交媒体营销策略。最后，我需要一些关于如何优化社交媒体策略的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取网红经济中的主要社交媒体平台分析
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'platform_analysis': 'The major social media platforms in the influencer economy include Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and Twitter. Each platform has unique features and user demographics that influence marketing strategies.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'platform_analysis': 'The major social media platforms in the influencer economy include Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and Twitter. Each platform has unique features and user demographics that influence marketing strategies.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取网红经济中的主要社交媒体平台分析，以便了解不同平台的特点和用户群体，从而为社交媒体策略提供参考。
